TopicTitle: [1.12.3] Not So SimpleConstruction! (NSSC) - SimpleConstruction! addon - 1.0.99.7-prerelease <Grazie Alerika> edition [24 Oct 2022]

Articles.Content:
Not So SimpleConstruction! (NSSC)

A SimpleConstruction! expansion which requires SimpleConstruction! and Kerbal Space Program.

By zer0Kerbal from @Mrcarrot, originally by @RealGecko

adopted with express permission and brought to you by KerbSimpleCo

Features

  • Parts Added
    • Mallet
    • Survey Stake
    • Recycler
      • Small
      • Large
    • Disposable Pad
    • Orbital Dock
  • Features Added
    • Adds Survey Station to the Cupola.
    • Optional patch included to add Survey Station to all crewed command parts (read file for instructions).

See More

Spoiler
  • Discussions and news on this mod: See Discussions or KSP Forums
  • Changelog Summary for more details of changes : See ChangeLog
  • Known Issues for more details of feature requests and known issues : See Known Issues

Installation Directions

Spoiler

Use CurseForge/OverWolf App (currently does not install dependencies) 1

or  1

Dependencies

  • Kerbal Space Program  2
  • SimpleConstruction! (SCON)
  • Either
    • Module Manager 3
    • Module Manager /Ll 3

Recommends

  • Spoiler
    • KerbalStats - keeps tract of time on task, which can increase task efficiency
    • Keridian Dynamics Vessel Assembly (KDVA)
    • SimpleLogistics! (SLOG)
    • Foundations (FND) - beta Helps prevent ground constructions from floating away
    • GPO (Goo Pumps & Oils') Speed Pump (GPO)

Suggests Mods that benefit SimpleConstruction! (SCON!)

  • Spoiler
    • KaboOom! (BOOM) another way to not go to space today
    • On Demand Fuel Cells (ODFC))
    • ISRU Thanks but no Tanks! (QBTT)
    • Six Crew Science Lab - simple patch that re-adds the missing four seats
    • Mining Expansion
    • B9 Stock Patches
    • Alternative Resource Panel
    • Olympic's ARP Icons (ARPI)
    • Community Trait Icons
    • Either: - B9 Part Switch or - Interstellar Fuel Switch Core

Edited February 10, 2020 by zer0Kerbal

Think I have it figured out now. Have been playing around with this at my MInmus base, where I don't really need it, but it's not too big a deal to cart things up from Kerbin if I find I need something else. Don't want to do that sort of experimentation at Gilly or anywhere else that's an interplanetary trip away. :-)

Took me an awful long time to figure out how to pound the darn stakes into the ground using the mallet. I wouldn't have guessed the "h" key. Doesn't help that I pretty much can't read any of the text in the KIS stuff (font way to small, with no obvious way to adjust it), but that's not something you can do much about. Eventually I googled around enough to find a KIS manual, which pointed me in the right direction, though I still have to quicksave before doing it or I mess up and leave a bunch of stakes rolling around.

The other thing that stymied me for a while you might want to clarify in the OP. I couldn't get the UI to come up from the cupola. Let's see  - have pilot in the cupola, have all the required mods, have the stake pounded in, did a quicksave/load. Only hint that pointed me right was buried in the crossed-out warning, which I'm guessing might eventually be deleted. Rereading it carefully, I noticed that it specifically mentioned the K&K cupola. Ah. Yes, I had a cupola, but the PPD-12 one instead of K&K planetary. Sent up a new base adding the K&K planetary one. Works now. Anyway, you might want to be a little more specific about i just working with that cupola instead of any one.

Thank you for maintaining some of the most important mods for KSP!

 

I am having troubles you see... My old eyes can't find the K&K cupola in my build menu. The only one available is the standard one and it is not working as a survey station.

3 hours ago, Dr Farnsworth said:

Thank you for maintaining some of the most important mods for KSP!

 

I am having troubles you see... My old eyes can't find the K&K cupola in my build menu. The only one available is the standard one and it is not working as a survey station.

 

 

Do you have the Kerbal Planetary Base Systems mod installed? I'm almost certain that cupola is in that mod. I don't see (though maybe my old eyes overlooked it) that mod listed in CKAN as a dependency for NSSC, but it probably ought to be. The cupola is unlocked by "command modules" in the tech tree. For me, it shows up in the VAB build menu under the Planetary Surface Structures tab,, though that might be a function of the "Group all Parts in Function filter" setting option for Planetary Base Systems.

I am not using kerbal planetary base system.

Your telling me that this mod now is dependent on parts from another mod? It didn't used to be that way (a few years ago).

2 hours ago, Dr Farnsworth said:

I am not using kerbal planetary base system.

Your telling me that this mod now is dependent on parts from another mod? It didn't used to be that way (a few years ago).

You'd have to ask zer0Kerbal to be 100% sure, but I'm 90% sure that K&K cupola is from planetary base systems. It fits the form factor of the other parts from that mod. I don't want to delete that mod from my save just to check because that would trash everything.  I also noticed that the ordinary cupola didn't work; see my post just a few above here. I couldn't tell you about years ago. I've had KSP a few years, but only started using this mod a few months ago.

The whole idea of Simple Construction and Not So Simple Construction is to bring extraplanetary launchpads abilities to the game without adding lots of new parts.

Making Planetary Base Systems a required mod seems to break the whole concept of what SC & NSSC were trying to accomplish.

 

At one time the stock Cupola worked as a survey station. Why can't it again?

On 5/17/2020 at 3:49 AM, rmaine said:

cupola

The cupula is the 'PPD-12 Cupola Module'

I will be trying to expand the patch to include more stock parts as survey stations.

On 5/17/2020 at 4:53 PM, Dr Farnsworth said:

now is dependent on parts from another mod? It didn't used to be that way (a few years ago).

only dependencies are the ones listed - KSP, ModuleManager, SimpleConstuction! and Kerbal Inventory System. KPBS isn't one.

On 5/17/2020 at 3:49 AM, rmaine said:

menu under the Planetary Surface Structures tab,, though that might be a function of the "Group all Parts in Function filter"

IIRC the PPD-12 Cupola Module is under Command normally.

On 5/17/2020 at 7:01 PM, rmaine said:

K&K cupola is from planetary base systems.

it is - but that part shouldn't be required - the stock PPD-12 Cupula Module should be working. If it isn't working - well, will check for myself once I get fully moved into my new-to-me machine.

On 5/18/2020 at 10:54 PM, Dr Farnsworth said:

The whole idea of Simple Construction and Not So Simple Construction is to bring extraplanetary launchpads abilities to the game without adding lots of new parts.

Making Planetary Base Systems a required mod seems to break the whole concept of what SC & NSSC were trying to accomplish.

 

At one time the stock Cupola worked as a survey station. Why can't it again?

That is the design philosophy of the entire SImpleXXX line of mods in a nutshell.

It should and it will and will endeavor to expand to other parts as well

 

***********************************

in general - I have started to update the OP.

I am working on an update.

Suggestions for what other parts (stock, DLL, mod) should be included as SurveyStations would be highly appreciated.

Am working on another addon (Foundations) that might help keeping things stuck in the ground.

Could someone verify that I am not loosing my mind.

I don't see a EPL UI available with the PPD cupola.

 

NSSC and simple const is installed.

Along with KIS and KAS

Oh, I also see the same thing. From Zer0Kerbal's description above, I infer this is a bug.
Any news on an update to fix this?

Guys! I just tried it and you must now use K&K Copula from Planetary Base System mod for KSP 1.11.2 in order to have UI showed up.... As this mod (NSSC) is very outdated  

but SC, Planetary Base System and NSSC still work for my 1.11.2 KSP well! Very useful for building bases anywhere across universe

Stock Cupola no longer works anymore for showing its UI ....

Edited May 1, 2021 by kennyc222

I think I fixed it!

You first need to create a text file and rename it NSSC_fixer.cfg (note that it is very important that the file is changed from a .txt to a .cfg)

Then paste this inside:  

@PART[*]:HAS[#CrewCapacity[>0],@MODULE[ModuleCommand],!MODULE[ELSurveyStation]]:NEEDS[Launchpad]
{
    @description ^= :$: <color=orange>\nNotSoSimpleConstruction Fixer Augmented. </color>:

    MODULE
    {
        name = ELSurveyStation
        
    }
}

 

Then put the .cfg file into your game data folder

Finally, you should backup your files and start your game

If something isn't working correctly or you have suggestions, I would be happy to help

Notes:

This mod adds survey station functionality to all crewed command pods

You can see if the mod has converted something by checking for orange text at the bottom of a part's description

Edited May 4, 2021 by Wheeziemcriblet

Also, I think the reason it didn't work in the first place is that in the file

NotSoSimpleConstruction > Patches > SurveyStation.cfg 

There is a piece of code:  

:HAS[MODULE[!ELSurveyStation]]

That should be: 

:HAS[!MODULE[ELSurveyStation]]

But this file only makes the cupola a survey station which is a bit too limited for my liking
will you update to KSP 1.12.x version? the mod seems old and will crash the game and the save

This is on the shortlist to have an update.

Since is only a parts/config should still be working in 1.12.3

well, if I intended to download NotsoSimpleConstruction via ckan, I will be forced to download older version of SimpleConstruction too ... i have the newer version of SimpleConstruction specifically for 1.12.x

On 1/15/2022 at 12:17 AM, kennyc222 said:

well, if I intended to download NotsoSimpleConstruction via ckan, I will be forced to download older version of SimpleConstruction too ... i have the newer version of SimpleConstruction specifically for 1.12.x 

 

you can tell CKAN to flag things for DNI, Held, etc.
